findings.title: Funds can be lost if any partner, projectFeeReceiver addresses is blacklisted
findings.description: If a partner or projectFeeReceiver address is blacklisted, funds may be inaccessible.

findings.title: Inability to Set deflationFeeReceiver State Variable
Lack of Check for Existing Whitelisting Status
State-changing methods are missing event emissions
Incorrect ownership transfer pattern
findings.description: Inheriting from OpenZeppelin's Ownable contract means you are using a single-step ownership transfer pattern. If an admin provides an incorrect address for the new owner this will result in none of the onlyOwner marked methods being callable again.
